entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 18.
